questionnair_definition.description: This is a sample questionnairDefinition designed for testing GazpachoSurvey.
questionnair_definition.title: Sample QuestionnairDefinition
questionnair_definition.welcometext: Thank you for taking the time to participate in this questionnairDefinition.

mail_message_template.body:
Dear Mr. $lastname,
You have been invited to take this questionnairDefinition.
The questionnaire will take about 15 minutes to complete and if you get interrupted, you can return later and continue where you left off.Click here to take the questionnairDefinition
mail_message_template.subject: PersonalInvitation to participate in questionnairDefinition

mail_message_template_translation.body:
Estimado Sr. $lastname,
Has sido invitado para participar en esta encuesta
Nos dedicas 15 minutos para realizar la encuesta?, puedes interrumpirla y completarla más tarde si es necesarioClick aqui para empezar
mail_message_template_translation.subject: Invitación para participar en una encuesta
